title: Not just a big owl
caption: Feather ears are the trademark
desc: Hedwig is probably one of the most famous owls in contemporary film history. As a faithful companion of Harry Potter, she has not only found a place in the hearts of many children, but also delighted many adults. We don't know why our leading actor looks so grim on today's picture of our homepage, but even a Lord Voldemort should be anxious and serious.
